attributes.action: Stop new access A590/Melton Brow[U6097] to Dalton Z00 CUMBRIA
attributes.additional_details: New access to Dalton Zoo Cumbria which is not suitable for the amount of traffic it will put in the general publics treat of loss of unnessesary lives and accidents.A590 has a small centrol reservation for the trattic already using.but huge ammounts are not and will not be safe enough for anyone.Would love this to be over-ruled as I am sure an already roundabout access would be better if not a slip road on and off the bridge.We the long term home owners of Melton Brow are so upset by the tthreat of all this we feel anxiuos and helpless.We would love to protect more than just ourselves.
